item.title: Aster leafhoppers: An unwanted guest migrating from U.S. for canola
item.description: Research scientist talks about the prevalence of aster yellows in canola in Alberta, with testing on its pest carriers and conditions in which it affects yields.

item.title: R-Tech fence mower wins for farm safety innovation at Ag Days
item.description: The R-Tech hydraulic fence mower reduces labour and a farmer's injury risk while cutting grass under pasture electric fence.

item.title: Scientists discover cause of pig ear necrosis
item.description: After years of research, a University of Saskatchewan team has discovered new information about pig ear necrosis and how to control it.

item.title: Video: FPT showcases hybrid engines, modular battery concept at Agritechnica
item.description: Diesel engines have been the workhorse in agriculture for decades. FPT Industrial is an engine manufacturer thatâ€™s looking ahead to the future.

item.title: National survey of farmer and rancher mental health launches
item.description: The Canadian Centre for Agricultural Wellbeing has launched its third National Survey of Farmer and Rancher Mental Health in Canada.

item.title: Opinion: Government silence loud on AAFC cuts
item.description: Canada's federal government trumpets fiscal responsibility; their silence on a day of massive Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada cuts was baffling at best.

item.title: Cottage cheese, chicken lead charge in multi-billion-dollar protein boom
item.description: Dairy farmers, meat producers, and food brands are pivoting to meet the surge in consumer interest and shifting health trends.

item.title: Australia adds farm equipment to right to repair
item.description: As the right-to-repair farm equipment issue slowly simmers in North America, the issue has been resolved Down Under.

item.title: Ontario Soils GeoHub allows farmers to harness soil data
item.description: Ontario Soils GeoHub provides accurate soil information that any farmer can access for free to inform crop, farm management and land stewardship decisions.

item.title: Ontario agribusiness gets $20 million for global competitiveness and market expansion
item.description: The $20 million funding helps boost Ontario's agriculture sector market expansion and global competitiveness.
